alert.note: Alert for Osage; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:57AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Osage and western Washington Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 256 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Pearsonia to 3 miles northwest of Cleveland. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Pawhuska... Hominy... Barnsdall... Wynona... Ochelata... Avant... Bigheart... Pearsonia... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... Hulah... Sunset Lake... Osage Hills State Park... Okesa... Wah Sha She State Park... Tallant... Pershing... Nelagoney... Wolco... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
